title: Sajid Javid – 2022 Comments on Men’s Mental Health Problems
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sajid Javid, the Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 24 June 2022.

We must treat suicides with the same urgency that we treat any other major killer.
